casebody.data:
No. 221,

Misc.

Utica Mutual Insurance Co. v. United States District Court for the Northern District of New York et al. Charles J. Barnhill on the motion. Solicitor General Marshall, Arnold Ordman, Dominick L. Manoli and Norton J. Come for National Labor Relations Board in opposition.

Motion for leave to file petition for writ of mandamus denied.

Mr. Justice Marshall took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
